name: The Seville Dress
description:
Elegant, sensual and exotic, this dress is guaranteed to turn heads at any event. 

Please note that this piece is made to order so contact customerservice@jessicabarkley.com with your measurements

50% French Burnt-Out Velvet, 50% Silk (lining)
Made in the USA

name: The Tiffany Gown in Blue and Red
description:
A classically elegant gown with couture bow detail.

Please note this piece is one of a kind and only available by custom order at the JB Atelier in Laguna Beach; please contact customerservice@jessicabarkley.com to make an appointment.

100% Silk Faille
Made in the USA

name: Silver Silk Jersey Evening Gown
description:
This gown embodies classic elegance in luxuriously soft silk jersey.

100% Silk Jersey
Made in the USA

name: The Red Statement Gown
description:
Stunning red, miles and miles of silk faille, and couture details make this an elegant statement piece.

Please note this piece is one of a kind and only available by custom order at the JB Atelier in Laguna Beach; please contact customerservice@jessicabarkley.com to make an appointment.

60% Silk Faille, 40% Silk Chiffon
Made in the USA

name: The Blue and Red Evening Gown
description:
A truly stunning evening gown in classic navy blue with red couture details.

Please note this piece is one of a kind and only available by custom order at the JB Atelier in Laguna Beach; please contact customerservice@jessicabarkley.com to make an appointment.

80% Silk Charmeuse, 20% Silk Chiffon
Made in the USA

name: Black Faille Evening Gown with Contrasting Flared Bottom
description:
A elegantly simple black gown with white contrast beneath the flared bottom to create interest and intrigue.

Please note this piece is one of a kind and only available by custom order at the JB Atelier in Laguna Beach; please contact customerservice@jessicabarkley.com to make an appointment.

100% Silk Faille
Made in the USA

name: The Tuxedo Gown
description:
This gown perfectly blends classic masculine style with feminine elegance for a timeless look.

Please note this piece is one of a kind and only available by custom order at the JB Atelier in Laguna Beach; please contact customerservice@jessicabarkley.com to make an appointment.

75% Silk Velvet, 25% Silk Satin
Made in the USA

name: Gown in Silk Satin  and Chiffon
description:
Silk Satin and Silk Chiffon with Swarovski Studs. Very elegant and flattering.This evening Gown is made to make an entrance. Yet its sophisticated and elegant. Very flattering to the figure as it hugs on the hips and then flows with generous layers of Chiffon. Feel like a queen when wearing this dress. As it is the case with all our Gowns this one is custom made for our customers. Taking into account their measurements.
Made in the US

name: Black and White Dress with French Lace
description:
Made with French Lace and a blend of Wool and Silk Fabric. Very elegant and timeless. Unexpected Slit on back trimmed with lace for a more seductive touch.
The Princess seams add structure and redefine the body shape in a very fitting way.
Made in the US
Sizes XS.S,M,L,XL

name: Satin Organza Dress A line Taupe
description:
This is a beautifully made Satin Organza dress with an A line that is bound to flatter everybody! Also available in White.
Great for weddings, Baptisms, Graduations, etc.
Sizes: XS,S,M and L
 Please review our size chart before ordering or give us your measurements.

name: Satin Organza A Line Dress
description:
This is a very easy to wear dress in Satin organza. Great for weddings or Baptisms or graduations. Made of 100% Satin Silk Organza. Constructed to fit to perfection and to look amazing! Also available in Taupe.
Sizes: XS,S,M and L
Please review our Size Chart before placing your order.
Or you can send us your measurements!

name: The Strapless Belle Dress (White)
description: Beautifully crafted Strapless Dress. This is a very comfortable strapless and the Satin Organza feels very luxurious. also available in taupe with black Lace.

name: The Strapless Belle Dress (Taupe)
description:
100% Satin Silk Organza dress with beaded trimming. Very Dior and very feminine. This feels very luxurious on and it moves with you. Also available in white.
Sizes: XS, S, M and L.
Please review size chart before placing your order. Or give us your measurements!

name: Long evening Dress Lace and Chiffon Black on Blue
description:
French Lace dress with a beautiful full double Layer of Silk Chiffon skirt. Very rich in texture and fits beautifully in the body.
Perfect for that event or special occasion.
Sizes: Xs, S,M, L and XL
Please review the Size chart before ordering.

name: Evening Gown  in Coordinated  Silk Organza
description:
2 piece Skirt goes over Slim Dress in Silk Organza with Coordinated Fabric. The Skirt comes out for a slimmer figure and when the skirt is on is a more dramatic look. Swarovski Crystal are carefully and strategically placed at front of SKirt Closure imitating the patterns on the skirt. Beautiful to the last detail the skirt can also be draped over the shoulders as a cape.
Made in the US
Sizes, XS,S M L XL.

name: Red Chiffon Silk Kimono
description: A signature piece for Jessica Barkley. This Silk Kimono is very versatile and timeless piece that can be taken to a party or to dinner with friends. Take it traveling its easy to pack and one of those dresses you will wear again and again and get complimented again and again as well.

name: Red Satin Organza Gown
description: This is a beautiful gown made out of the most rich color of red and 100% Satin organza. Many many yards of organza go into this astounding dress all cut on the bias to form the perfect circle. Wearing this dress is like walking on clouds. Feel like a princess when you walk into the party!

name: Pleated Tulle Evening Dress
description: This beautiful dress is very structured up top and then becomes soft and dreamy from the waist down. Under the pleated Netting is a beautiful skirt made out of 100% Silk Charmeuse. This dress is flattering and yet incredibly easy to wear. Classic style in a very stylish shape.

name: Black "Bubble Tulle" Evening Gown
description:
Beautiful and daring. The dress is fitted and shapely made out of matte Jersey and the "bubble" is made out of many many yards of French Tulle. This Tulle is made with burnt velvet to create a 2 dimensional pattern. 
Look and feel like a star in your next event!

name: Cotton Pique Mermaid Bridal Gown
description:
This is an amazing Bridal Gown. Starting with the beautifully curved front line that accentuates in a very sexy yet unusual way. The back has a deep V  shape than slims down elegantly. This cut can go as deep as you please. After all it is a custom made gown. The fit is phenomenal thanks to the thickness of the cotton pique. Then it all opens up at the bottom in 2 tiers. One more flared than the other. Guess what the bottom tier is completely removable. This dress permits you making a beautiful entrance and then when you are ready to rumba just remove the bottom and dance the night away! Headpiece and gloves are a one of a knid item made by the designer for this dress. Further inquiries please contact the designer at the e mail below.
This is a custom order
Please contact the designer to make an appointment
jessicabarkley@jessicabarkley.com

name: Halter Top Lace Bridal Gown
description:
This Bridal Gown is made of 100% Silk. The top is 4 ply Silk made into a halter neckline. The skirt is made out of yards and yards of French lace. A bit higher in the front and dragging in the back. The waist is accentuated by a Silk belt that wraps around and ends in the back with a custom made flower that blends the 2 fabrics in this dress the 4 ply and the lace to perfection. This Gown is easy to wear flirty and very romantic.
This is a custom order.

name: Lace Corset Bridal Gown
description:
This is  a very racy yet elegant Bridal Gown. The Corset is made of 100% French Silk Lace and the skirt is 100% Silk Duchess Satin. The first skirt is decorated with Swarovski Crystals here and there just enough to sparkly the right amount. This is a magnificent gown with lots of attention to detail that will make you feel sexy and distinguished at the same time.
This is a custom made gown. Please contact the designer to make an appointment. jessicabarkley@jessicabarkley.com

Gloves featured with the gown were made by the designer and are one of a kind. For further inquiries about the Headpieces and gloves please contact the designer at:
jessicabarkley@jessicabarkley.com

name: Detachable Cape/Skirt Bridal Gown with Lace Dress
description:
This piece is a very versatile Gown. The Cape is made of 100% Silk Satin Organza and it is sprinkled with tiny Silk Satin Flowers adorned with Swarovski Pearls. The cape can be turned into a skirt after the ceremony or it can be completely removed leaving a beautiful simple dress made of 100% French lace. WIth round neckline and caped sleeves this dress is so elegantly simple and timeless you would want to save it for your daughter! 
Head piece Is a one of a kind made by the designer. For  inquiries about the headpieces and gloves please contact the designer.
This is a custom made dress. For an appointment please contact the designer at jessicabarkley@jessicabarkley.com

name: Satin Organza Bridal Gown With Box Pleated Train
description:
This adorably Simple and elegant Bridal Gown features a Box Pleated Organza Train that start at edge of the back and goes on for a while. Sprinkled with tiny silk organza flowers that are adorned with tiny Swarovski Crystals all along. The Train is detachable making this a very easy to wear gown. Make a splash while entering and feel sexy and free while celebrating with your guests. The gown is made of 100% Satin Organza Silk.
This is a custom made gown. The head piece is a one of a kind custom piece made by Jessica Barkley for questions about the head pieces and gloves please contact the designer at jessicabarkley@jessicabarkley.com

name: Notched Strapless Bridal Gown
description:
Made out of 100% Silk Duchess Satin and embroidered with Shindo Ribbon. This is a unique yet simple Bridal gown that enhances the best parts of a woman's body. With a short train that starts under the hips and a V back that slims down and elongates the back, this dress is sure to make you feel like a princess on your wedding day. This is for the bride that knows elegance does not have to come with tons of Bling and shine. The head piece and gloves were made by Jessica Barkley to match the gown and are available upon request.
This is a custom made gown.

name: Debutante/Bridal Dress in Silk Organza
description:
Yards and Yards and Yards of Silk organza go into this beautiful Debutante/Bridal Dress. Custom made Satin ribbons adorn the hem in each layer. Perfect for that Debutante Ball or the bride that wants to be all out in white. Swarovski pearls hang from the shoulder making this dress even more especial. This dress can also be done in many other colors. Please call for an appointment. 94 338 1408.
Custom made orders only.
